name: Demand Planner SQL
description:
Обязанности:
  • Maintaining forecasts and ensuring high customer satisfaction level CIS wide
  • New model introduction monitoring and timely spare parts initial ordering including CIS overall orders
  • Active cooperation with CIS subsidaries and vendors on parts supply issues
  • Support data acquisition, validation, and management from different data sources
  • Controlling of KPI achievement: forecasting accuracy, stock level, back order ratio, etc.
Требования:
  • Experience in demand planning not less than 2 years ( management of big volume of SKU)
  • Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Access, Power Point), VBA, SQL as a must( at least User level)
  • ERP experience (SAP usage skill as a must)
  • Excellent analytical skills and attention to details
  • Good understanding of demand planning process
Условия:
  • Salary + bonuses
  • Medical insurance
  • Mobile compensation
  • Meal compensation
